channel.title: Magic spell timer {PI}

item.title: Magic spell timer {PI}
item.dc:creator: @yo_dude_1345 yo dude 1345
item.description:
@yo_dude_1345 wrote:

Ok I am using a Pi base ATM and I have been trying to make ice barrage increase in speed when a certain item is equipted (an exception). I came up with a code but it did not work at all. So I was wondering if someone could help me with this. It would be highly appreciated.

code is below:

I am using a pi base and I placed this code in combat assistant

if (c.usingMagic) {
switch(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[c.spellId][0]) {
case 12871: // ice blitz
case 13023: // shadow barrage
case 12891:

        default:

} return 4;
}
else
if(c.usingMagic || c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 1379);{
switch(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[c.spellId][0]){
case 12891:
return 1;
}
}

Read full topic
